name: LeVirtue Dragon
effectText:
2 Level 3 monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Virtue Stream" from your Deck to your hand. You can activate 1 of these effects;
●Detach 1 material from a monster you control, then add 1 Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua monster from your GY to your hand, except "LeVirtue Dragon".
●Target 2 Xyz Monsters on the field; attach 1 material from 1 of those monsters to the other.
You can only use each effect of "LeVirtue Dragon" once per turn.
